activities:
(1)Walt Disney Pictures processes or will process personal data received through a web application (“Publicity Global System”) which collects and distributes contact information.
(2)Walt Disney Pictures processes or will process inventory information related to theatrical venues (“Trusted Device List System”) and maintains theater contact information. (3) Walt Disney Pictures processes or will process personal data through a tool that processes contact information ("JobScience") for the purpose of applicant information management.
(4) Walt Disney Pictures processes or will process personal data through a tool that processes site security information ("SHIELD") and contains vendor contact information.
contacttitle1: Assistant General Counsel, Chief Trust Officer
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Denmark, Finland, France, Germany, Ireland, Italy, Netherlands, Spain, Sweden, United Kingdom
personaldata: Online data, including data relating to employees of Walt Disney Pictures and employees of entities affiliated with Walt Disney Pictures.
